messages.title: 24 HOUR HEALTHCARE IS A DISGRACE
messages.content: The Welsh Liberal Democrats are the only party that will turn around our disgraceful out of hours health service.

messages.title: Lifeline Services Now! Our HOSPITALS Need Intown
messages.content: The Labour and Tory plans for the future of Bronglais hospital are not good enough.

messages.title: Edrychwch am y aderyn (Look for the bird)
messages.content: Support the Welsh Liberal Democrats fight against Labour's waste by helping Wyn and the local Lib Dems.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Turn around the disgraceful out of hours health service.
Improve plans for Bronglais hospital beyond what Labour and Tory plans offer.
Fight against Labour's waste and help local Liberal Democrats.
Protect local services like our Post Offices from closure.

issues.health: Turn around the disgraceful out of hours health service.

images.caption: WYN WILLIAMS - Standing up for MONTGOMERYSHIRE

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet also includes a form to help Wyn Williams on election day and to receive further information from the Liberal Democrats.
